description:
The Essential boxer briefs are made of luxurious Tencel Lyocell with a hint of spandex that moves with you. The front pouch cradles you during any activity, and flatlock seams prevent chafing or discomfort in sensitive areas.Super-soft Tencel Lyocell and spandex is breathable and smooth for all-day comfort.Contoured pouch with functional fly provides excellent support.Stay-put leg design won't ride up.Flatlock seams throughout ensure a chafe-free wear.6in. inseam.

        Sustainability









                      Preferred Lyocell






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Patagonia Essential 6" Boxer Briefs - Men's
